title: Person of Interest - Aletheia - Wonderful and terrible
author: George Finch
comment: "Everything slides towards chaos. Your creation, it brings us poor souls a cup full of order. Your child is a dancing star." Chills.
At least Finch in his way, tried to tell Arthur that he wasn't God by saying that sometimes Finch regretted building the machine.
For me this is, maybe, the most beautiful scene of the show, Arthur is such a good character, thank you to have done this video and Root's escape, are you american ?

And for the second and last(?) time, a white square turns yellow in front of our eyes. It's too bad they fudged that little not-yet-established detail in the pilot. Reese has a yellow square around his head the first time we see him through the Machine's eyes, before he knows about the Machine's existence, which we later learn (with examples like this) is the one and only prerequisite to having a yellow square.
